articles.title: Australia risk losing six London medals after swimmer tests positive - ESPN Australia
articles.description: Six Australian swimmers risk losing their Olympic medals after Brenton Rickard, who was part of the men's 4x100 metre medley team that won bronze at the 2012 London Games, tested positive for a banned substance, the Age reported on Friday.
articles.content: Six Australian swimmers are at risk of losing their Olympic medals after Brenton Rickard, who was part of the men's 4x100 metre medley team that won bronze at the 2012 London Games, tested positive f… [+1472 chars]
